description: Monitors Kubernetes cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics.

panels.description: Memory used by containers, in comparision to the memory available on machines
panels.title: Cluster Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU used by containers in comparison to the amount of CPU cores available in machines
panels.title: Cluster CPU Usage

panels.description: Disk space used by containers as a share of all avalable disk space
panels.title: Cluster Filesystem Usage

panels.description: The CPU usage of individual pods, in percentage  of 1 core
panels.title: Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: CPU usage on a container level
panels.title: Container CPU usage

panels.description: Sum of all network transfer from and to containers
panels.title: Network Transfer

title: Kubernetes
